contentrichtext.text: The '''list of lakes in Sweden''' contains the major lakes in the nation of [[Sweden]]. However, Sweden has over 97,500 lakes larger than {{convert|2|acre|m2}}, so the list is not comprehensive.<ref name="stur"> "Lakes, Streams and Rivers" ''Smorgasbord'', 2007, webpage (English language): [http://www.sverigeturism.se/smorgasbord/smorgasbord/natrecspo/nature/lakes.html SverigeTur-lakes]. </ref> {{TOCright}} ==Alphabetical list== Some of the major lakes in Sweden barney: *[[Åresjön]] *[[Bolmen]] *[[Boren]] *[[Dellen]] *[[Glan (lake)|Glan]] *[[Hjälmaren]] *[[Ikesjaure]] *[[Hornavan]] *[[Mälaren]] *[[Mien crater|Mien]] *[[Roxen]] *[[Runn]] *[[Lake Siljan|Siljan]] *[[Sommen]] *[[Sparren]] *[[Storavan]] *[[Storsjön]] *[[Torneträsk]] *[[Tåkern]] *[[Vänern]] *[[Vättern]] ==Largest lakes by area== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Lakes of Sweden by area<ref name="scb"> [http://www.scb.se/statistik/_publikationer/OV0904_2012A01_BR_02_A01BR1201.pdf Statistisk årsbok 2012] Statistiska Centralbyrån. </ref> |- ! Rank ! Lake ! Area |- |1. || [[Vänern]]||align="right"|5519 km² |- |2. || [[Vättern]]||align="right"|1886 km² |- |3. || [[Mälaren]]||align="right"|1090 km² |- |4. || [[Hjälmaren]]||align="right"|477 km² |- |5. || [[Storsjön]]||align="right"|456 km² |- |6. || [[Torneträsk]]||align="right"|330 km² |- |7. || [[Siljan (lake)|Siljan]]||align="right"|292 km² |- |8. || [[Hornavan]]**||align="right"|262 km² |- |9. || [[Akkajaure]]||align="right"|260 km² |- |10. || [[Uddjaure]]||align="right"|249 km² |} == Deepest lakes == ''Subject to geological variations'' #[[Hornavan]] - 228 meters #[[Torneträsk]] - 168 m #[[Vojmsjön]] - 145 m #[[Stor-Blåsjön]] - 144 m #[[Stor-Rensjön]] - 140 m #[[Virihaure]] - 138 m #[[Kallsjön]] - 134 m #[[Vastenjaure]] - 134 m #[[Siljan (lake)|Siljan]] - 134 m #[[Kultsjön]] - 130 m == Largest lakes by volume == Lakes with the most water: #[[Vänern]] - 153,000 million m³. #[[Vättern]] - 77,600 mio m³ #[[Torneträsk]] - 17,100 mio m³ #[[Mälaren]] - 14,300 mio m³ #[[Hornavan]] - 11,900 mio m³ #[[Siljan]] - 8,090 mio m³ #[[Storsjön]] - 8,020 mio m³ #[[Kallsjön]] - 6,140 mio m³ #[[Virihaure]] - 4,430 mio m³ #[[Storuman]] - 4,180 mio m³ == Water life == * In lakes and rivers, there are a total of 52 species of [[fresh water]] fish; but several of them are rare. == See also == *[[Geography of Sweden]] *[[List of islands of Sweden]] *[[List of rivers of Sweden]] ==Notes== <references/> ==References== * ''Fakta och Fiske'', Fiskeriverket, 2003. * Data from [[SMHI]], 2002. {{commons category|Lakes of Sweden}} <!-- Sikfiskar i sjöarna: http://www.fiskbasen.se/sik.html--> {{Sweden topics}} {{Europe topic|List of lakes in}} [[Category:Lakes of Sweden|*]] [[Category:Lists of lakes by country|Sweden]] [[Category:Lists of landforms of Sweden|Lakes]]
